message: We run together down the dark and narrow alley.

name: クリア
message: "Ah!"
Clear abruptly stops, changes direction, then stops again.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's wrong?"

name: クリア
message: "...There are too many of them. We're surrounded."
Now I hear them too. Footsteps all around us.
Men appear at either end of the alley, approaching slowly.
There are about about ten of them. They all look like they mean business.
At the head of the group is that guy from the other day, the glasses-wearing yakuza.

name: 兄貴
message: "Hey there."
His face is covered with bruises, and his smile is not what you'd call reassuring.

name: 兄貴
message: "See, it just ain't in my nature to be selfish, so I thought I oughta be polite and repay you two."
With a jerk of his chin, he signals his men.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! Get off me!"

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Shut your mouth!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I said don't touch me!"

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Fuck! Gimme a hand here!"

name: クリア
message: "Master!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "L-Let me go!"
I kick several of them away, but there are too many. Soon, they have my arms pinned.

name: クリア
message: "Master!"

name: 兄貴
message: "Hold it. Behave, and I promise no one will hurt your precious 'master.'"

name: クリア
message: "...Really?"

name: 兄貴
message: "Really."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear, don't listen to him!"

name: クリア
message: "But if I behave, they won't hurt you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You idiot!"
But it's pointless. Clear stands still and lets them grab him.

name: 兄貴
message: "Now, as I recall, you, Mr. Gas Mask, were the one who gave me the best 'present.'"
The man walks up to Clear and gets right in his gas-masked face.

name: 兄貴
message: "First, I'll be taking this bullshit mask of yours."

name: クリア
message: "No."

name: 兄貴
message: "You really don't understand the situation, do you? Hey, hold him tight."
He reaches for the gas mask, but just as he's about to pull it off―

name: クリア
message: "I said no!"

name: 兄貴
message: "Ugh!"
Clear knees him in the gut.
He doubles over, sputtering, then glares at Clear.

name: 兄貴
message: "...Motherfucker!"
Enraged, the man grabs Clear by the head and smashes his face into the ground.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear!!"
Once Clear is down, the man starts to kick him mercilessly.
The others join in. Between their legs, I can see Clear huddled on the ground.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let―fuck―let me go! Clear!"
He doesn't have a chance!

name: 兄貴
message: "I think that's enough. Wouldn't wanna kill him."
Grinning smugly, he rolls Clear over with his foot. Clear's arms flop to the ground.

...He's still alive, right?
He's okay... right?
